long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SalesCaddy is built by sales reps for sales reps. With SalesCaddy you will never need to take notes during your calls ever again. SalesCaddy will transcribe the call and provide you with either a sales or general summary of the transcription. From there you can make edits and easily copy and paste the test into your CRM. SalesCaddy allows you to fully focus on the prospect during your meeting and will allow you to build relationships more quickly. We capture the personal details that are often missed or forgotten in addition to the sales insights you need to be successful.
